inv.Name: Barrel Back Trench Coat
inv.Description: oversized cotton trench coat with hood. featuring large front patch pockets, and appliques 'cowtown colloseum' patch on the back.

inv.Name: Super Wide Barel Trousers
inv.Description: cotton trousers with a super-wide fit, tapered towards the ankle. comes with button braces

inv.Name: Super Wide Barell trousers (wool)
inv.Description: woolen trousers in a super-wide fit, tapered towards the ankle. come with button braces

inv.Name: Frankenstien shirt long sleeve
inv.Description: cotton, plaid shirt.

inv.Name: Orange rucksack
inv.Description: made from a part synthetic, heavy duty wool. the bag can be draped into different shapes using the metal, handmade buttons. all other hardware is handmade.

inv.Name: Netted crotch longjohn
inv.Description: netted longjohns in a heavyweight cotton jersey. hand dyed and featuring a popper clasp at the waistband with a bungee cord for adjustability.

inv.Name: Cowboy Cape
inv.Description: cape toile made from workers jackets and a pair of workers pants. featuring a cowboy patch on the right shoulder.

inv.Name: Skyreacher Puffer Sample Jacket
inv.Description: synthetic puffer jacket sample. includes some raw edges.

inv.Name: Swamp Thing wideboy
inv.Description: heavy weight wideboy. outershell made from heavy cotton drill and each leaf machine stitched onto the surface. Cotton lined with a synthetic border.

inv.Name: Bull riding vest
inv.Description: made from cotton ribbing with elastane. features an appliques bull head. hand dyed.

inv.Name: Bull Riders vest
inv.Description: recycled vest made from cotton. with appliques patches and padding. hand dyed

inv.Name: Jogging pants
inv.Description: made from cotton ribbing with elastane. features an appliques set of guns on the hips. hand dyed.

inv.Name: cowtown chaps
inv.Description: chaps made from a recycled jacket. fabric contents, cotton and nylon. features appliques patches.

inv.Name: Soft Armour Set
inv.Description: synthetic hood and arms set, to be worn on top of an existing item of clothing. some bleeding of leather into the main panels is reason for price.

inv.Name: Patches
inv.Description: assortment of patches made from synthetics, cottons and leathers.

inv.Name: Black Vest
inv.Description: early uni project piece. heavy foam core interior. exterior made from cotton coated in black silicone (caulking) in order to create a waterproof seal. features an adjustable strap and carabiners

inv.Name: Thunder caps
inv.Description: made using a variery of materials, mostly cottons, ribs and synthetic ripstops.

inv.Name: Cowboy hat
inv.Description: made from upholstery fabrics with a wire brim covered in green ribbing.

inv.Name: Red Toy
inv.Description: cotton ribbing toy stuffed with recycled scrap fabric.

inv.Name: Bag toy
inv.Description: made from cotton and stuffed with recycled sheeps wool. bag is made from hand dyed ribbing.

inv.Name: stone the crows puffa jacket
inv.Description: synthetic and cotton mix puffa jacket. fish bowl hood with cropped front and back. bungee cord adjustable hem.

inv.Name: green bombardier jacket
inv.Description: made from cotton and nylon ripstop. cropped jacket with large front pockets. leather detailing on cuffs and pockets.

inv.Name: red bombardier jacket
inv.Description: made from cotton. cropped jacket with large front pockets. leather detailing on cuffs and pockets.

inv.Name: blue bombardier jacket
inv.Description: made from corduroy and nylon. cropped jacket with large front pockets. leather detailing on cuffs and pockets.

inv.Name: red and orange trucker hybrid
inv.Description: made from cotton, fleece and some leather detailings. cropped fit.

inv.Name: apron jacket
inv.Description: made from recycled aprons. 100% cotton.

inv.Description: all made using recycled tshirts
